mods.abstract: Inner court and colonnade, Temple of Horus at Edfu (Ptolemaic Period); view from Egyptian motif incised inner court looking out to papyrus column colonnade and bench with two figures (foreground); pylon with images of deities incised into stone (background); "88 Haute- Egypte Temple d'Edfou" in pencil on back of print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
